chapter.text: 92|1|Sapata raatira, yetiya i acchanna karae
92|2|sapata dinara, yetiya i ujjbala haya
92|3|arau sapata se'i sattara, yijane nara arau narai srsti karaiche.
92|4|Niscaya tomalokara karmapracesta bibhinna prakrtira.
92|5|Eteke konoba'i dana karaile arau takbaraa aralambana karaile
92|6|arau yi uttama taka satya buli grahana karaile
92|7|ami tara babe sahaja pathata cala sugama karai dima.
92|8|Arau konoba'i krpanali karaile arau nijake amukhapeksi bhabile
92|9|arau yi uttama taka asbikara karaile
92|10|ami tara babe kathina pathata cala sugama karai dima.
92|11|Arau tara sampada tara kono kamata nahiba, yetiya si dhbansa ha’ba.
92|12|Niscaya pathapradarsana karaatorae amara kartabya.
92|13|Niscaya amiye'i parakala arau ihakalara malika.
92|14|Eteke ami tomalokaka lelihana ju'i samparke satarka karai dicho.
92|15|Tata praraesa karaiba kerala se'i byakti yi ha’ba carama hatabhagya
92|16|Yiye asbikara karaiche arau mukha ghuraa'i laiche.
92|17|Arau iyara paraa duraaita rakha ha’ba parama muttakbi byaktika
92|18|yiye atmasud'dhira babe nija sampada dana karae
92|19|arau tara prati karao ene anugraha na'i yara pratidana diba lagiba
92|20|kerala tara mahana pratipalakara santustira pratyasata
92|21|arau anatipalame si santusti labha karaiba.
